p: Animals imported into Egypt are not randomly distributed throughout the country, instead they are transported to specific locations where the risk of RVFV transmission by vectors will be quite variable. First, they are taken directly to specific quarantine premises depending on the species and origins ( Fig 10A). After quarantine, imported camels also follow an established movement pattern: they may be either be taken to slaughterhouses ( Fig 10B) or to animal markets ( Fig 9B). In contrast, all cattle are slaughtered within the quarantine facilities.
